Plot: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.
Title: In Bruges
Actors: Elizabeth Berrington, Rudy Blomme, Olivier Bonjour, Mark Donovan
tomatoConsensus: Featuring witty dialogue and deft performances, In Bruges is an effective mix of dark comedy and crime thriller elements.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 22 wins & 50 nominations.
